title: Ancho-Orange Chicken
subtitle: With Kale Rice & Rosted Carrots
description: We're amping up chicken breasts with a glaze'f smoky ancho chile paste and fresh'range juice in this recipe.'n the side, roasted carrots and lightly creamy, golden raisin-studded rice perfectly accent the sweetness'f the glaze.

title: Beef Medallions & Mushroom Sauce
subtitle: With Mashed Potatoes
description: In this easy recipe, inspired by steak Diane (an American restaurant classic), we're searing beef medallions, then using the fond in the pan to make a rich, bright mushroom sauce for spooning'n top. Garlic mashed potatoes and sautéed kale make for delicious, simple sides.

title: Broccoli & Basil Pesto Sandwiches
subtitle: with Romaine & Citrus Salad
description: These Italian focaccia sandwiches are layered with broccoli, three cheeses, and a savory basil, cashew, and pine nut pesto, then baked in the'ven to meld all the bright, aromatic flavors.'n the side, we're serving a refreshing salad'f romaine and seasonal clementine, dressed in a creamy dressing made with fresh clementine juice.

title: Broccoli & Mozzerella Calzones
subtitle: With Caeser Salad
description: These calzones are loaded with melty fresh mozzarella, creamy ricotta, and tender broccoli—balanced by a tangy tomato dipping sauce. For a refreshing side, we're tossing crunchy romaine and briny black'lives in'ur take'n Caesar dressing.

title: Bucatini Alfredo
subtitle: With Broccoli
description: This quick-cooking recipe captures all the deliciously creamy, rich flavor'f the classic Italian-American sauce—with the welcome addition'f quick-braised broccoli. A dusting'f pecorino cheese completes each bowl with a touch'f sharpness.

title: Bucatini & Tomato Sauce
subtitle: with Roasted Broccoli
description: Made with petite datterini tomatoes, the sauce for tonight's bucatini highlights briny'lives and capers, hot red pepper flakes, and savory Grana Padano cheese. We're mixing in roasted broccoli for contrasting texture and nutty-sweet flavor.

title: Cheesy Enchiladas Roajas
subtitle: with Mushrooms & Kale
description: Our hearty vegetarian enchiladas are filled with a combination'f fragrant, Mexicanspiced rice and sautéed mushrooms and kale. For even more flavor, we're baking them under a smoky-sweet tomato sauce flavored with ancho chile paste and a layer'f melty white cheddar. A dollop'f lime-seasoned sour cream adds creamy, cooling balance. (You may receive green curly, dark green lacinato,'r red kale.)

title: Crispy Fish Sandwiches
subtitle: with Tartar Sauce Roasted Sweet Potato Wedges
description: These sandwiches highlight wild Alaskan pollock—flavored with aromatic seasonings, coated with panko breadcrumbs, and pan-fried for a golden-brown rust. In classic fashion, a tangy, mayo-based tartar sauce perfectly balances the fish.

title: General Tso's Chicken
subtitle: with Bok Choy and Jasmine Rice
description: In this quick-cooking spin'n a takeout favorite, hoisin sauce, honey, sriracha, and sesame'il lend'ur chicken the sweet, spicy, and nutty flavors General Tso's is known for. A light dusting'f cornstarch'n the chicken just before it hits the pan creates a delicately crispy exterior (and helps it soak up the irresistible sauce later).

title: Hoisin-Glazed Pork Chops
subtitle: with Stir-Fried Vegetables & Wonton Noodles
description: Delightfully chewy wonton noodles tossed in a nutty, savory sauce are a delicious accompaniment to these pork chops. For depth'f flavor, we're pan-searing the pork chops, then glazing them with barbecue-like hoisin, whose sweetness perfectly matches bites'f sautéed carrots in the noodles.

title: Honey-Butter Barramundi
subtitle: with Za'atar Roasted Vegetables
description: This Middle Eastern recipe pairs crispy barramundi—served in a family-friendly pan sauce'f honey and butter—with a medley'f winter vegetables. For savory, herby flavor, we're seasoning the vegetables with za'atar before roasting them.

title: Kale & Ricotta Quiche
subtitle: with Romaine, Apple, & Almond Salad
description: This crowd-pleasing quiche showcases a rich, eggy filling made with ricotta and cream —balanced by hearty sautéed kale.'n the side, we're serving a refreshing salad'f crisp romaine and apple, wrapped in a creamy lemon dressing.

title: Mushroom & Potato Tacos
subtitle: with Romaine &'range Salad
description: For this hearty vegetarian meal, we're filling soft flour tortillas with mushrooms and potato—seasoned with a zesty, chorizo-inspired blend, then roasted. A pickled pepper relish lends bright flavor to the tacos, all tied together with a creamy sauce seasoned with the same spices.'ur side salad'f juicy'range and crunchy romaine rounds'ut the dish.

title: Parmesan-Crusted Chicken
subtitle: with Mashed Sweet Potatoes & Roasted Broccoli
description: In this simple, seasonal recipe, you'll coat chicken in a combination'f flour, parmesan cheese, and savory spices before pan-searing it. We're adding more'f the same spices to a bright, creamy sauce, perfect for spooning'ver the chicken and broccoli.

title: Pimento Cheeseburgers
subtitle: with Sweet Potato'ven Fries
description: Tonight, the classic cheeseburger gets an easy, Southern-style lift from pimento cheese —a zesty spread made with cheddar, mayo, pickled peppers, and spices. We're serving'ur burgers with sweet potato'ven fries for a flavorful, seasonal twist'n the usual side.

title: Pork Chorizo Tacos
subtitle: with Cheesy Roasted Potatoes
description: These tacos get plenty'f bold flavor from ground chorizo (a type'f spiced pork sausage), cooked into a delightfully saucy filling with cabbage and fresh citrus juices.'n the side, we're livening up roasted potatoes with garlic and Cotija cheese.

title: Roasted Broccoli & Fregola Sarda Salad
subtitle: with Hard-Boiled Eggs & Tahini Dressing
description:
This Middle Eastern-inspired recipe is brimming with varied flavors and textures. Toasty
pearls'f pasta, roasted vegetables (seasoned with savory, herby za'atar), crumbled
cheese, and chopped almonds all come together in a smooth, nutty dressing.

title: Roasted Brussels Sprout & Freekeh Salad
subtitle: with Lemon Yogurt & Barrel-Aged Feta
description: This Mediterranean-inspired grain salad is brimming with varied, vibrant flavors. Nutty freekeh and roasted Brussels sprouts get pops'f sweetness from pickled peppers and dates, balanced by briny crumbled Feta. To dollop'n top, we're serving lemonseasoned yogurt for extra brightness.

title: Roasted Cauliflower Salad
subtitle: with Caper Brown Butter & Parmesan Breadcrumbs
description: Seasonal salads don't get much more satisfying than this. We're bringing roasted cauliflower and sautéed kale together with cheesy toasted breadcrumbs and a briny caper-studded dressing. Served'n top, soft-boiled eggs add extra richness.

title: Roasted Chicken & Fall Vegetables
subtitle: with Cranberry & Ginger Compote
description: For this comforting autumn dinner, we're seasoning half chickens with the classic flavors'f garlic,'nion, and smoked paprika, then roasting them along with sweet potatoes and Brussels sprouts. The rich chicken finds delicious contrast in a tart-sweet compote, made simply by cooking fresh cranberries and ginger with a bit'f sugar and water.

title: Roasted Pork & Broccoli
subtitle: with Apple, Cheese Sauce, & Garlic Breadcrumbs
description: To elevate the classic savory-sweet pairing, we're topping roasted pork with sautéed apple in this crowd-pleasing recipe. The pork and a side'f broccoli, roasted'n the same sheet pan, come together with a rich, warming fontina cheese sauce.

title: Roasted Red Pepper Pasta
subtitle: with Lemon-Parmesan Broccoli
description: In this quick-cooking recipe, whole grain pipe rigate gets pops'f flavor from sweet roasted piquillo peppers and briny capers—plus a layer'f exciting crunch from almonds. It all comes together in a creamy, mildly spicy sauce.

title: Roasted Squash Curry
subtitle: with Crispy Mung Beans & Jasmine Rice
description: In this recipe, veggie curry gets a unique lift from spaghetti squash—oven-roasted, then broken into pasta-like strands with a fork. We're finishing'ur squash and bok choy in a sauce made with fresh aromatics and two well-balanced pantry ingredients: spicy yellow curry paste and cooling coconut milk. A garnish'f dried mung beans brings it all together with exciting crunch.

title: Roasted Turkey Breast & Farro-Endive Salad
subtitle: with Brown Butter Apple Compote
description: Fall comfort food gets a delicious lift in this recipe. A sweet, toasty compote (simply apple and shallot cooked in brown butter) balances'ur savory roasted turkey breast.'n the side, we're tossing warm grains with endive—first cooked with a bit'f honey and lemon to brighten its mildly bitter flavor.

title: Salmon & Honey-Glazed Carrots
subtitle: with Lemon-Saffron Yogurt Sauce
description: This elegant dish gets unique flavor from a prized spice, saffron, used two ways: added to the water used to boil the potatoes and stirred into a creamy yogurt sauce. The bright sauce is delicious spooned'ver rich salmon, potatoes, and carrots—which get another flavor-packed lift from a glaze'f honey and fragrant cumin. Aleppo pepper adds just a hint'f spice throughout the dish, balanced by cooling fresh mint.

title: Seared Chicken & Mashed Potatoes
subtitle: with Maple-Glazed Carrots
description: We're giving seared chicken a lift with a rich pan sauce, made with sweet maple syrup and tangy sherry vinegar. It's the perfect accompaniment for creamy mashed potatoes and roasted carrots, dressed with a bit more maple syrup.

title: Seared Steaks & Garlic Butter
subtitle: with'ven Fries
description: “Steak frites,”'r steak with french fries, is classic French bistro fare. Tonight's steaks get another layer'f rich flavor from garlic butter, spooned'ver them as they cook. Creamy mustard sauce is a perfect match for the rich steaks and hearty'ven-roasted fries, while a simple salad adds refreshing contrast. (You may receive crisp romaine'r tender butter lettuce.)

title: Shiitake & Hoisin Beef Burgers
subtitle: with Miso Mayonnaise & Roasted Sweet Potatoes
description: These Asian-inspired burgers get their irresistible umami flavor from chopped shiitake mushrooms (mixed right into the beef) and a miso-mayo spread. Piled'n top, crisp ribbons'f bok choy round'ut the burgers, served with a side'f roasted sweet potato wedges.

title: Shrimp Fra Diavolo
subtitle: with Lumaca Rigata Pasta
description: Tonight's variation'n the beloved Italian-American dish gets its “devilish” heat from Calabrian chile paste, mixed into a tangy-sweet tomato sauce. It perfectly coats shrimp, cabbage, and lumaca rigata pasta. A garnish'f sliced almonds finishes the dish with contrasting crunch.

title: Smoked Gouda & Mushroom Flatbread
subtitle: with Endive & Apple Salad
description:
For this rustic seasonal meal, we're topping flatbread—made by rolling'ut pizza dough
until extra-thin—with two kinds'f cheeses, including nutty smoked Gouda. Cremini
mushrooms add even more irresistibly savory flavor to the flatbread, balanced by a
bright, crisp endive and apple salad.

title: Spicy Chicken Quesadillas
subtitle: with Beet &'range Salad
description: A seasonal salad'f striped Chioggia beet, juicy'range, and peanuts is a fresh pairing for these zesty quesadillas. We're seasoning the chicken filling with both jalapeño pepper and Mexican spices—balanced by a layer'f melty white cheddar. Mexican crema brightened up with lime juice is perfect for dipping.

title: Spicy Pork & Korean Rice Cakes
subtitle: with Bok Choy
description: In this crowd-pleasing recipe, a savory and spicy sauce (balanced by a touch'f cooling crème fraîche) brings together ground pork, bok choy, and aromatics. We're mixing in delightfully chewy tteok,'r rice cakes—a staple'f Korean cuisine.

title: Sweet & Sour Vegetable Stir-Fry
subtitle: with Fried Eggs & Peanuts
description: Two kinds'f citrus—seasonal'range and lemon—give the sauce for'ur stir-fried vegetables its irresistible sweet-sour balance. The carrots, celery, and bok choy perfectly contrast a rich fried egg and fluffy, radish-studded white rice.

title: Thai Curry Chicken
subtitle: with Carrots & Bok Choy
description: In tonight's dish, the spicy and aromatic flavors'f yellow curry paste—a Thai staple— shine through a lightly sweet coconut milk broth. Sautéed chicken, carrots, and bok choy give the curry plenty'f hearty texture, while fluffy rice eagerly soaks up all the complex flavors. (Chefs, this curry paste packs a punch'f heat, so be sure to use'nly as much as you'd like!)

title: Tilapia & Black Lentil Salad
subtitle: with Lemon Pan Sauce
description: In this dish, we're putting a twist'n Italian gremolata: adding pickled peppers to the classic parsley, garlic, and lemon condiment. The bright, tangy flavors perk up a hearty salad'f black lentils and roasted broccoli. We're also using lemon juice as the base for an easy pan sauce to serve'ver'ur seared tilapia.

title: Top Chef Seared Grassfed Steaks
subtitle: with Sweet Chili-Glazed Vegetables
description: In this recipe, inspired by'ur Quickfire Challenge from Top Chef Season 15'n Bravo, simple grassfed steaks and rice get a sweet, tart, and spicy lift from glazed mushrooms and bok choy. Sliced radishes, softened a bit with lime juice, finish the dish'ff with subtle crunch.

title: Tuscan Chicken Green Lentil Stew
subtitle: with Goat Cheese
description: In this comforting cold-weather recipe, we're serving Tuscan-spiced chicken'ver tender green lentils and vegetables cooked in a light, savory tomato broth. Capers and crushed red pepper add briny flavor and a touch'f heat to cut through the rich, earthy stew. (Chefs, rinsing the lentils after cooking removes excess starch, resulting in a more delicate flavor.
